shortDescription: Swipe at shape, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at the shape, without necessarily touching it.

shortDescription: Swipe at shape, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at the shape, without necessarily touching it.

shortDescription: Swipe at shape, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Place a shape near one of {0}'s hands. {0} is able to swipe at the shape, without necessarily touching it.

shortDescription: Hear cups and react, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to react in anyway, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Hear cups and react, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to react in anyway, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Hear cups and react, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to react in anyway, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Hear cups and react, on tummy
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy. Knock two cups together continuously, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to react in anyway, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Hear and see tower knocked down and react
longDescription: Build a tower and knock it down, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to react in anyway, such as moving their head or making sounds.

shortDescription: Eye track moving shape, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Move a shape slowly back and forth in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to track the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Eye track moving shape, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Move a shape slowly back and forth in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to track the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Eye track moving shape, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Move a shape slowly back and forth in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to track the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Eye focus on shape, on back
longDescription: {0} is on their back. Hold a shape steady in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to focus on the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Eye focus on shape, on side
longDescription: {0} is on their side. Hold a shape steady in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to focus on the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Eye focus on shape, seated and supported
longDescription: {0} is seated and supported (e.g. you holding them up). Hold a shape steady in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to focus on the shape with their eyes.

shortDescription: Coo or laugh, when parent making funny faces and noises
longDescription: Make funny faces and noises in front of {0}. {0} is able to coo or laugh.

shortDescription: Eye contact with parent for 3 seconds
longDescription: Put your face in front of {0}'s face. {0} is able to establish eye contact with you for 3 seconds.

shortDescription: Look at parent's eyes and mouth, when parent speaking
longDescription: Speak to {0} and in front of their face. {0} is able to look at your eyes and mouth.

shortDescription: Hold head up, supported in superman posture
longDescription: Hold up {0} in the superman posture. {0} is able to hold up their head, in line with their body, for a few seconds.

shortDescription: Make sucking sounds
longDescription: {0} is able to making sucking sounds.

shortDescription: Roll from side to back
longDescription: {0} is able to roll from their side to their back.

shortDescription: Look at hands
longDescription: {0} is able to look at their hands.
